short_summary: Examination of chemical components in marine cargo containers
description: The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) may examine marine cargo containers upon arrival at their land border ports of entry. While the Border Services Officers focus on commodities within the containers, the CBSA is also concerned with air quality within the containers and its impact on the health and safety of examining officers. The purpose of this tender is to identify chemical components (including fumigants and solvents) found in containers at the Queenston Bridge Commercial Operations in Niagara-on-the-Lake, Ontario.

### Tender Announcement
#### Contract Title
Testing for Fumigants and Solvents - Queenston Bridge Commercial Operations, Niagara-on-the-Lake, Ontario

#### Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number:** 1000406506
* **Reference Number:** cb-6816-62147277
* **Publication Date:** June 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date:** July 25, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

#### Tender Description
Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) may conduct air quality assessments in marine cargo containers arriving at Land Border Ports of Entry (POE). To ensure the health and safety of Border Services Officers (BSOs), we require an expert to identify chemical components, including fumigants and solvents, in containers located at:

* Queenston Bridge Commercial Operations
* 14154 Niagara Parkway
* Niagara-on-the-Lake, Ontario, L0S 1J0

The contract period is from the contract start date to March 31, 2024, with the possibility of extending for up to five (5) additional one-year periods.

#### Tender Instructions and Requirements
* Bidders must meet the minimum requirements outlined in the tender documents.
* A Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available on the Canada Buys tendering platform.
* Suppliers must submit their proposal in accordance with the instructions outlined in the RFP document.

#### Important Dates
* July 25, 2023: Tender Closing Date
* Batch Release of Proposal Opening Results: August 15, 2023
* Award Notice: September 1, 2023

#### Point of Contact
Name: Yuqiao Hu
Email: yuqiao.hu@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
Office: 355 North River Road, Tower B, 17th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0L8

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca.

Note that this tender has expired. The below additional information is for previous tenderers' reference.

* The services required are:
	+ Identify chemical components (including fumigants and solvents)
	+ Provide recommendations for maintaining a safe and healthy work environment for BSOs
